title: Former Challenger team LF Flex players gold + (Good attitude -> good teamwork and communication)
body:
Myself and another buddy both part of a challenger team in s4 are looking for players to rank up in flex with. Looking for a big roster to play within. 

Requirements: 

Gold + Solo Q ideally. Minimum Silver Flex. 
Discord willing
Friendly, Focus on improving yourself before blaming others
Willing to improve (We have tons of experience from Season 1). 
Chill, not easily tilted, good for laugh. 

Basically don't be that guy who dies once in lane and spams ff.

replies.body: Hey dude add me in game :) Boss Jallad more than interested.
